Content:
Rally the party at the target location.
Party members are granted a one-time use skill that teleports them to the raised banner.

Rally the party at the target location.
Party members are granted a one-time use skill that teleports them to the raised banner.
The banner inspires faith in the Divine, granting a small boost to attributes.

Rally the party at the target location.
Party members are granted a one-time use skill that teleports them to the raised banner.
The banner unleashes the hunger of the pack, granting [1]% lifesteal.
